thread.title: How to make edible flowers out of pancakes
thread.title_full: How to make edible flowers out of pancakes

title: How to make edible flowers out of pancakes
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device How to make edible flowers out of pancakes 28 February 2017 Last updated at 08:06 GMT 
It's Shrove Tuesday, which is the perfect time to decorate your plate with some edible pancake flowers that will wow your family. 
People traditionally make pancakes the day before Ash Wednesday to use up food not to be eaten during Lent, which is a time for fasting. Related Topics
